mapper.select:
SELECT Z.* FROM ( SELECT
TLM.MASTER_SEQ ,TLM.MASTER_TO_ID ,TLM.COM_CODE ,FN_COM_CODE(TLM.COM_CODE) AS COM_CODE_NM ,TLM.MEMBER_SEQ ,FN_MEMBER_NAME(TLM.MEMBER_SEQ) AS MEMBER_NM ,TLM.SUB_YN ,TLM.PRE_REG_YN ,TLM.PRE_LC_NUM ,TLM.PL_CLASS ,FN_CD_DTL('CLS001',TLM.PL_CLASS) AS PL_CLASS_NM ,TLM.PL_WORK ,TLM.CORP_USER_YN ,TLM.CAREER_TYP ,FN_CD_DTL('CAR001',TLM.CAREER_TYP) AS CAREER_TYP_NM ,TLM.API_CAREER_YN ,TLM.PL_PRODUCT ,FN_CD_DTL('PRD001',TLM.PL_PRODUCT) AS PL_PRODUCT_NM ,TLM.PL_REG_STAT ,FN_CD_DTL('REG001',TLM.PL_REG_STAT) AS PL_REG_STAT_NM ,TLM.PL_STAT ,FN_CD_DTL('MAS001',TLM.PL_STAT) AS PL_STAT_NM ,TLM.PL_REGIST_NO ,TLM.CON_NUM ,TLM.CI ,CASE WHEN TLM.PL_CLASS = '1' THEN TLM.PL_M_NAME WHEN TLM.PL_CLASS = '2' THEN TLM.PL_CEO_NAME END AS PL_M_NAME
,TLM.PL_M_Z_ID ,TLM.PL_M_Z_ID_EDU ,FN_CELLPHONE(TLM.PL_CELLPHONE) AS PL_CELLPHONE ,TLM.ADDR ,TLM.ADDR_DETAIL ,TLM.REG_ADDR ,TLM.REG_ADDR_DETAIL ,TLM.ADDR_BASE ,TLM.OTHER_FIELD ,TLM.WITHIN_GOVR ,TLM.PL_EDU_NO ,TLM.CAREER_START_DATE ,TLM.CAREER_END_DATE ,TLM.ENTRUST_DATE ,TO_DATE(TLM.COM_CONT_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') AS COM_CONT_DATE ,TLM.PL_MERCHANT_NAME ,TLM.PL_CEO_NAME ,TLM.PL_MERCHANT_NO ,TLM.PL_BUSINESS_NO ,TLM.COMP_PHONE_NO ,TLM.CORP_FOUND_DATE ,TLM.CAPITAL ,TLM.VOTING_STOCK_CNT ,TLM.PL_PAY_STAT
,TO_DATE(TLM.COM_REG_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') AS COM_REG_DATE ,TO_DATE(TLM.FIRST_APP_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') AS FIRST_APP_DATE ,TLM.CRE_APP_DATE ,TLM.CRE_LICENSE_DATE ,TLM.PAY_DATE ,TLM.SEND_MSG ,TLM.PL_HIST_CD ,TLM.COM_HAEJI_DATE ,TLM.CRE_HAEJI_DATE ,TLM.FILE_SEQ ,TLM.REG_TIMESTAMP AS ORIGIN_REG_TIMESTAMP ,TO_CHAR(TLM.REG_TIMESTAMP,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REG_TIMESTAMP ,TLM.UPD_SEQ ,TLM.UPD_TIMESTAMP AS ORIGIN_UPD_TIMESTAMP ,TO_CHAR(TLM.UPD_TIMESTAMP,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS UPD_TIMESTAMP ,TLM.pl_stat_req_seq ,TLM.pl_stat_req_path ,TLM.USER_SEQ FROM TB_LC_MAS01 TLM
AND TLM.USE_YN = 'Y' AND TLM.PL_REG_STAT = '1' -- 모집인 상태가 승인전인 것
AND TLM.REG_PATH = #{regPath} AND TLM.PL_STAT IN ('2','5','8','10','11','12','13','14','15','16') -- 승인요청, 보완요청, 취소, 등록요건불충족, 보완미이행, 미결제, 승인일홀딩, 승인요청취소, 회원사확인완료, 승인거절
AND TLM.COM_CODE IN ('3000001',(SELECT COM_CODE FROM TB_LC_MEMBERS WHERE MEMBER_SEQ = #{regSeq})) -- 시스템이랑 로그인한 사용자와 동일한 회원사 코드인 정보만 출력
AND FN_MEMBER_NAME(TLM.MEMBER_SEQ) LIKE '%' || #{memberNm} || '%'
AND TLM.PL_CLASS = #{plClass} AND TLM.CORP_USER_YN = 'N'
AND TLM.PL_CLASS = '1' AND TLM.CORP_USER_YN = 'Y'
AND TLM.PL_PRODUCT = #{plProduct}
AND (CASE WHEN TLM.PL_CLASS = '1' THEN TLM.PL_M_NAME WHEN TLM.PL_CLASS = '2' THEN TLM.PL_CEO_NAME END ) LIKE '%' || #{plMName} || '%'
AND TLM.PL_M_Z_ID = #{plMZId}
AND FN_CELLPHONE(TLM.PL_CELLPHONE) LIKE '%' || #{plCellphone} || '%'
AND TLM.PL_MERCHANT_NAME LIKE '%' || #{plMerchantName} || '%'
AND TLM.PL_MERCHANT_NO = #{plMerchantNo}
AND TLM.PL_STAT = #{plStat}
AND TLM.MASTER_TO_ID LIKE '%' || #{masterToId} || '%'
AND TLM.REG_TIMESTAMP >= #{srchDate1}::TIMESTAMP
AND TLM.REG_TIMESTAMP < #{srchDate2}::TIMESTAMP + INTERVAL '1 day'
ORDER BY TLM.MASTER_SEQ ASC )Z

SELECT TLM.MASTER_SEQ ,TLM.MASTER_TO_ID ,TLM.COM_CODE ,FN_COM_CODE(TLM.COM_CODE) AS COM_CODE_NM ,TLM.MEMBER_SEQ ,(SELECT EMAIL FROM TB_LC_MEMBERS WHERE MEMBER_SEQ = TLM.MEMBER_SEQ) AS EMAIL ,FN_CELLPHONE((SELECT MOBILE_NO FROM TB_LC_MEMBERS WHERE MEMBER_SEQ = TLM.MEMBER_SEQ)) AS MOBILE_NO ,FN_CELLPHONE((SELECT EXTENSION_NO FROM TB_LC_MEMBERS WHERE MEMBER_SEQ = TLM.MEMBER_SEQ)) AS EXTENSION_NO ,TLM.SUB_YN ,TLM.PRE_REG_YN ,TLM.PL_CLASS ,FN_CD_DTL('CLS001',TLM.PL_CLASS) AS PL_CLASS_NM ,TLM.PL_WORK ,TLM.CORP_USER_YN ,TLM.CAREER_TYP ,FN_CD_DTL('CAR001',TLM.CAREER_TYP) AS CAREER_TYP_NM ,TLM.API_CAREER_YN ,TLM.PL_PRODUCT ,FN_CD_DTL('PRD001',TLM.PL_PRODUCT) AS PL_PRODUCT_NM ,TLM.PL_REG_STAT ,FN_CD_DTL('REG001',TLM.PL_REG_STAT) AS PL_REG_STAT_NM ,TLM.PL_STAT ,FN_CD_DTL('MAS001',TLM.PL_STAT) AS PL_STAT_NM ,TLM.PL_REGIST_NO ,TLM.CON_NUM ,TLM.CI ,TLM.PL_M_NAME ,TLM.PL_M_Z_ID ,FN_CELLPHONE(TLM.PL_CELLPHONE) AS PL_CELLPHONE ,TLM.ADDR ,FN_CD_DTL('ADD001',TLM.ADDR) AS ADDR_NM ,TLM.ADDR_DETAIL ,TLM.REG_ADDR ,TLM.REG_ADDR_DETAIL ,TLM.ADDR_BASE ,TLM.OTHER_FIELD ,TLM.WITHIN_GOVR ,TLM.PL_EDU_NO ,CASE WHEN TLM.CAREER_START_DATE IS NULL THEN NULL WHEN TLM.CAREER_START_DATE = '' THEN NULL ELSE TO_DATE(TLM.CAREER_START_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') END AS CAREER_START_DATE ,CASE WHEN TLM.CAREER_END_DATE IS NULL THEN NULL WHEN TLM.CAREER_END_DATE = '' THEN NULL ELSE TO_DATE(TLM.CAREER_END_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') END AS CAREER_END_DATE ,CASE WHEN TLM.ENTRUST_DATE IS NULL THEN NULL WHEN TLM.ENTRUST_DATE = '' THEN NULL ELSE TO_DATE(TLM.ENTRUST_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') END AS ENTRUST_DATE ,CASE WHEN TLM.COM_CONT_DATE IS NULL THEN NULL WHEN TLM.COM_CONT_DATE = '' THEN NULL ELSE TO_DATE(TLM.COM_CONT_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') END AS COM_CONT_DATE ,TLM.PL_MERCHANT_NAME ,TLM.PL_CEO_NAME ,TLM.PL_MERCHANT_NO AS ORIGIN_PL_MERCHANT_NO ,TLM.PL_MERCHANT_NO ,TLM.PL_BUSINESS_NO ,TLM.COMP_PHONE_NO ,TO_DATE(TLM.CORP_FOUND_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') AS CORP_FOUND_DATE ,TLM.CAPITAL ,TLM.VOTING_STOCK_CNT ,TLM.PL_PAY_STAT ,TO_DATE(TLM.COM_REG_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') AS COM_REG_DATE ,TO_DATE(TLM.FIRST_APP_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') AS FIRST_APP_DATE ,TLM.CRE_APP_DATE ,TLM.CRE_LICENSE_DATE ,TLM.PAY_DATE ,TLM.SEND_MSG ,TLM.PL_HIST_CD ,FN_CD_DTL('DRP001',TLM.PL_HIST_CD) AS PL_HIST_CD_NM ,TLM.PL_HIST_TXT ,TLM.APPLY_HIST_TXT ,TO_DATE(TLM.COM_HAEJI_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') AS COM_HAEJI_DATE ,TO_DATE(TLM.CRE_HAEJI_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') AS CRE_HAEJI_DATE ,TLM.FILE_SEQ ,TLM.PRE_LC_NUM ,TO_CHAR(TLM.REG_TIMESTAMP,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REG_TIMESTAMP ,TLM.UPD_SEQ ,TO_CHAR(TLM.UPD_TIMESTAMP,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS UPD_TIMESTAMP ,TLM.pl_stat_req_seq ,TLM.pl_stat_req_path ,TLM.api_res_msg ,TLM.USER_SEQ ,FN_MEMBER_NAME(B.REG_SEQ) AS MEMBER_NM FROM TB_LC_MAS01 TLM left join tb_lc_mas01_step b ON TLM.master_seq = b.master_seq and b.pl_stat = '16' where TLM.USE_YN = 'Y' AND TLM.MASTER_SEQ = #{masterSeq}

SELECT VIOLATION_SEQ ,MASTER_SEQ ,VIOLATION_CD ,FN_CD_DTL('VIT001',VIOLATION_CD) AS VIOLATION_CD_NM ,VIO_NUM ,APPLY_YN ,REG_SEQ ,TO_CHAR(REG_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYYMMDD') AS REG_TIMESTAMP ,UPD_SEQ ,UPD_TIMESTAMP ,USER_SEQ FROM TB_LC_VIOLATION WHERE USER_SEQ = #{userSeq} AND APPLY_YN != 'D' ORDER BY VIOLATION_SEQ ASC

SELECT TLMI.EXC_SEQ ,TLMI.MASTER_SEQ ,TLMI.CAREER_TYP ,FN_CD_DTL('CAR001',TLMI.CAREER_TYP) AS CAREER_TYP_NM ,TLMI.POSITION_NM ,TLMI.EXC_NAME ,TLMI.PL_M_Z_ID ,TLMI.PL_EDU_NO ,TO_DATE(TLMI.CAREER_START_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') AS CAREER_START_DATE ,TO_DATE(TLMI.CAREER_END_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') AS CAREER_END_DATE ,TLMI.FULL_TM_STAT ,FN_CD_DTL('FTM001',TLMI.FULL_TM_STAT) AS FULL_TM_STAT_NM ,TLMI.EXPERT_STAT ,FN_CD_DTL('EXP001',TLMI.EXPERT_STAT) AS EXPERT_STAT_NM ,TLMI.FILE_SEQ FROM TB_LC_MAS01_IMWON TLMI
AND TLMI.USE_YN = 'Y' AND TLMI.EXC_SEQ = #{excSeq}

SELECT TLME.EXP_SEQ ,TLME.MASTER_SEQ ,TLME.CAREER_TYP ,FN_CD_DTL('CAR001',TLME.CAREER_TYP) AS CAREER_TYP_NM ,TLME.EXP_NAME ,TLME.PL_M_Z_ID ,TLME.PL_EDU_NO ,TO_DATE(TLME.CAREER_START_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') AS CAREER_START_DATE ,TO_DATE(TLME.CAREER_END_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') AS CAREER_END_DATE ,TLME.FILE_SEQ FROM TB_LC_MAS01_EXPERT TLME
AND TLME.USE_YN = 'Y' AND TLME.EXP_SEQ = #{expSeq}

SELECT OPER_SEQ ,MASTER_SEQ ,OPER_NAME ,PL_M_Z_ID ,FILE_SEQ FROM TB_LC_MAS01_IT
AND USE_YN = 'Y' AND OPER_SEQ = #{operSeq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_LC_MAS01_HIST ( MASTER_SEQ ,MASTER_TO_ID ,REG_PATH ,COM_CODE ,MEMBER_SEQ ,USER_SEQ ,SUB_YN ,PRE_REG_YN ,PRE_LC_NUM ,PL_REGIST_NO ,CON_NUM ,PL_CLASS ,PL_WORK ,CORP_USER_YN ,CAREER_TYP ,API_CAREER_YN ,PL_PRODUCT ,PL_REG_STAT ,PL_STAT ,CI ,PL_M_NAME ,PL_M_Z_ID ,PL_M_Z_ID_EDU ,PL_CELLPHONE ,ADDR ,ADDR_DETAIL ,REG_ADDR ,REG_ADDR_DETAIL ,ADDR_BASE ,OTHER_FIELD ,WITHIN_GOVR ,PL_EDU_NO ,CAREER_START_DATE ,CAREER_END_DATE ,ENTRUST_DATE ,COM_CONT_DATE ,PL_MERCHANT_NAME ,PL_CEO_NAME ,PL_MERCHANT_NO ,PL_BUSINESS_NO ,COMP_PHONE_NO ,CORP_FOUND_DATE ,CAPITAL ,VOTING_STOCK_CNT ,PL_PAY_STAT ,COM_REG_DATE ,FIRST_APP_DATE ,APP_DATE_HOLD ,CHK_YN ,ADMIN_CHK_YN ,ADMIN_CHK_SEQ ,COM_UPD_DATE ,CRE_APP_FI_DATE ,CRE_APP_DATE ,CRE_LICENSE_DATE ,PAY_DATE ,SEND_MSG ,PL_HIST_CD ,PL_HIST_TXT ,APPLY_HIST_TXT ,APPLY_COM_HIST_TXT ,COM_HAEJI_DATE ,CRE_HAEJI_DATE ,FILE_SEQ ,USE_YN ,REG_SEQ ,REG_TIMESTAMP ,UPD_SEQ ,UPD_TIMESTAMP ,pl_stat_req_seq ,pl_stat_req_path ) SELECT MASTER_SEQ ,MASTER_TO_ID ,REG_PATH ,COM_CODE ,MEMBER_SEQ ,USER_SEQ ,SUB_YN ,PRE_REG_YN ,PRE_LC_NUM ,PL_REGIST_NO ,CON_NUM ,PL_CLASS ,PL_WORK ,CORP_USER_YN ,CAREER_TYP ,API_CAREER_YN ,PL_PRODUCT ,PL_REG_STAT ,PL_STAT ,CI ,PL_M_NAME ,PL_M_Z_ID ,PL_M_Z_ID_EDU ,PL_CELLPHONE ,ADDR ,ADDR_DETAIL ,REG_ADDR ,REG_ADDR_DETAIL ,ADDR_BASE ,OTHER_FIELD ,WITHIN_GOVR ,PL_EDU_NO ,CAREER_START_DATE ,CAREER_END_DATE ,ENTRUST_DATE ,COM_CONT_DATE ,PL_MERCHANT_NAME ,PL_CEO_NAME ,PL_MERCHANT_NO ,PL_BUSINESS_NO ,COMP_PHONE_NO ,CORP_FOUND_DATE ,CAPITAL ,VOTING_STOCK_CNT ,PL_PAY_STAT ,COM_REG_DATE ,FIRST_APP_DATE ,APP_DATE_HOLD ,CHK_YN ,ADMIN_CHK_YN ,ADMIN_CHK_SEQ ,COM_UPD_DATE ,CRE_APP_FI_DATE ,CRE_APP_DATE ,CRE_LICENSE_DATE ,PAY_DATE ,SEND_MSG ,PL_HIST_CD ,PL_HIST_TXT ,APPLY_HIST_TXT ,APPLY_COM_HIST_TXT ,COM_HAEJI_DATE ,CRE_HAEJI_DATE ,FILE_SEQ ,USE_YN ,#{regSeq} ,NOW() ,#{updSeq} ,NOW() ,pl_stat_req_seq ,pl_stat_req_path FROM TB_LC_MAS01 WHERE MASTER_SEQ = #{masterSeq}

INSERT INTO TB_LC_MAS01_STEP ( MASTER_SEQ ,PL_REG_STAT ,PL_STAT ,PL_HIST_TXT ,REG_TIMESTAMP ,REG_SEQ ,pl_stat_req_seq ,pl_stat_req_path ) SELECT MASTER_SEQ ,PL_REG_STAT ,PL_STAT ,CASE WHEN PL_STAT = '4' THEN FN_CD_DTL('DRP001',PL_HIST_CD) WHEN PL_STAT IN ('3','5','6','7','8','10','11','12','16') THEN PL_HIST_TXT WHEN PL_STAT IN ('2') THEN APPLY_HIST_TXT ELSE '' END AS PL_HIST_TXT ,NOW() ,#{regSeq} ,#{regSeq} ,pl_stat_req_path FROM TB_LC_MAS01 WHERE MASTER_SEQ = #{masterSeq}
mapper.select:
SELECT
Z.* FROM ( SELECT TLM.MASTER_SEQ ,TLM.MASTER_TO_ID ,TLM.COM_CODE ,FN_COM_CODE(TLM.COM_CODE) AS COM_CODE_NM ,TLM.MEMBER_SEQ ,FN_MEMBER_NAME(TLM.MEMBER_SEQ) AS MEMBER_NM ,TLM.SUB_YN ,TLM.PRE_REG_YN ,TLM.PRE_LC_NUM ,TLM.PL_CLASS ,FN_CD_DTL('CLS001',TLM.PL_CLASS) AS PL_CLASS_NM ,TLM.CORP_USER_YN ,TLM.CAREER_TYP ,FN_CD_DTL('CAR001',TLM.CAREER_TYP) AS CAREER_TYP_NM ,TLM.API_CAREER_YN ,TLM.PL_PRODUCT ,FN_CD_DTL('PRD001',TLM.PL_PRODUCT) AS PL_PRODUCT_NM ,TLM.PL_REG_STAT ,FN_CD_DTL('REG001',TLM.PL_REG_STAT) AS PL_REG_STAT_NM ,TLM.PL_STAT ,FN_CD_DTL('MAS001',TLM.PL_STAT) AS PL_STAT_NM ,TLM.PL_REGIST_NO ,TLM.CON_NUM ,TLM.CI ,CASE WHEN TLM.PL_CLASS = '1' THEN TLM.PL_M_NAME WHEN TLM.PL_CLASS = '2' THEN TLM.PL_CEO_NAME END AS PL_M_NAME
,TLM.PL_M_Z_ID ,TLM.PL_M_Z_ID_EDU ,FN_CELLPHONE(TLM.PL_CELLPHONE) AS PL_CELLPHONE ,TLM.ADDR ,TLM.ADDR_DETAIL ,TLM.REG_ADDR ,TLM.REG_ADDR_DETAIL ,TLM.ADDR_BASE ,TLM.OTHER_FIELD ,TLM.WITHIN_GOVR ,TLM.PL_EDU_NO ,TLM.CAREER_START_DATE ,TLM.CAREER_END_DATE ,TLM.ENTRUST_DATE ,TLM.COM_CONT_DATE ,TLM.PL_MERCHANT_NAME ,TLM.PL_CEO_NAME ,TLM.PL_MERCHANT_NO ,TLM.PL_BUSINESS_NO ,TLM.COMP_PHONE_NO ,TLM.CORP_FOUND_DATE ,TLM.CAPITAL ,TLM.VOTING_STOCK_CNT ,TLM.PL_PAY_STAT
,TO_DATE(TLM.COM_REG_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') AS COM_REG_DATE ,TO_DATE(TLM.FIRST_APP_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') AS FIRST_APP_DATE ,TLM.CRE_APP_DATE AS ORIGIN_CRE_APP_DATE ,TO_DATE(TLM.CRE_APP_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') AS CRE_APP_DATE ,TLM.CRE_LICENSE_DATE AS ORIGIN_CRE_LICENSE_DATE ,TO_DATE(TLM.CRE_LICENSE_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') AS CRE_LICENSE_DATE ,TLM.PAY_DATE AS ORIGIN_PAY_DATE ,TO_DATE(TLM.PAY_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') AS PAY_DATE ,TLM.SEND_MSG ,TLM.PL_HIST_CD ,TLM.COM_HAEJI_DATE ,TLM.CRE_HAEJI_DATE ,TLM.FILE_SEQ ,TO_CHAR(TLM.REG_TIMESTAMP,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REG_TIMESTAMP ,TLM.UPD_SEQ ,TO_CHAR(TLM.UPD_TIMESTAMP,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS UPD_TIMESTAMP ,(SELECT TLP.PAY_TYPE FROM TB_LC_PAY TLP WHERE TLP.MASTER_SEQ = TLM.MASTER_SEQ ORDER BY TLP.PAY_SEQ DESC LIMIT 1) AS PAY_TYPE ,(SELECT TLP.NAME FROM TB_LC_PAY TLP WHERE TLP.MASTER_SEQ = TLM.MASTER_SEQ ORDER BY TLP.PAY_SEQ DESC LIMIT 1) AS PAY_NAME ,(SELECT TLP.REG_TIMESTAMP FROM TB_LC_PAY TLP WHERE TLP.MASTER_SEQ = TLM.MASTER_SEQ ORDER BY TLP.PAY_SEQ DESC LIMIT 1) AS ORIGIN_PAY_REG_DATE ,(SELECT TO_CHAR(TLP.REG_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY-MM-DD') FROM TB_LC_PAY TLP WHERE TLP.MASTER_SEQ = TLM.MASTER_SEQ ORDER BY TLP.PAY_SEQ DESC LIMIT 1) AS PAY_REG_DATE ,TLM.pl_stat_req_seq ,TLM.pl_stat_req_path ,TLM.USER_SEQ FROM TB_LC_MAS01 TLM
AND TLM.USE_YN = 'Y'
AND TLM.REG_PATH = #{regPath} AND TLM.PL_STAT IN ('3','4','6','7','9') -- 변경요청, 해지요청, 변경요청(보완), 해지요청(보완), 완료
AND TLM.COM_CODE IN ('3000001',(SELECT COM_CODE FROM TB_LC_MEMBERS WHERE MEMBER_SEQ = #{regSeq})) -- 시스템이랑 로그인한 사용자와 동일한 회원사 코드인 정보만 출력
AND FN_MEMBER_NAME(TLM.MEMBER_SEQ) LIKE '%' || #{memberNm} || '%'
AND TLM.PL_CLASS = #{plClass} AND TLM.CORP_USER_YN = 'N'
AND TLM.PL_CLASS = '1' AND TLM.CORP_USER_YN = 'Y'
AND TLM.PL_PRODUCT = #{plProduct}
AND (CASE WHEN TLM.PL_CLASS = '1' THEN TLM.PL_M_NAME WHEN TLM.PL_CLASS = '2' THEN TLM.PL_CEO_NAME END ) LIKE '%' || #{plMName} || '%'
AND TLM.PL_M_Z_ID = #{plMZId}
AND FN_CELLPHONE(TLM.PL_CELLPHONE) LIKE '%' || #{plCellphone} || '%'
AND TLM.PL_MERCHANT_NAME LIKE '%' || #{plMerchantName} || '%'
AND TLM.PL_MERCHANT_NO = #{plMerchantNo}
AND TLM.PL_REG_STAT = #{plRegStat}
AND TLM.PL_STAT = #{plStat}
AND TLM.MASTER_TO_ID LIKE '%' || #{masterToId} || '%'
AND TLM.REG_TIMESTAMP >= #{srchDate1}::TIMESTAMP
AND TLM.REG_TIMESTAMP < #{srchDate2}::TIMESTAMP + INTERVAL '1 day'
ORDER BY TLM.MASTER_SEQ ASC )Z
select FN_CD_DTL('PRD002',pl_product_dtl_cd) AS pl_product_dtl_cd_nm from tb_lc_product_detail where master_seq = #{masterSeq}
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_LC_VIOLATION SET APPLY_YN = 'Y' ,UPD_SEQ = #{updSeq} ,UPD_TIMESTAMP = NOW() WHERE VIOLATION_SEQ = #{violationSeq}
mapper.select: SELECT VIOLATION_SEQ ,MASTER_SEQ ,VIOLATION_CD ,FN_CD_DTL('VIT001',VIOLATION_CD) AS VIOLATION_CD_NM ,VIO_NUM ,APPLY_YN ,REG_SEQ ,TO_CHAR(REG_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYYMMDD') AS REG_TIMESTAMP ,UPD_SEQ ,UPD_TIMESTAMP ,USER_SEQ FROM TB_LC_VIOLATION WHERE USER_SEQ = #{userSeq} AND APPLY_YN = 'N' ORDER BY VIOLATION_SEQ ASC

select * from tb_lc_mas01 where user_seq = #{userSeq} and pl_product in ('01', '05') and pl_class = #{plClass} AND ( (PL_REG_STAT = '1' AND PL_STAT IN ('2','13','15')) OR (PL_REG_STAT = '2' AND PL_STAT IN ('9')) OR (PL_REG_STAT = '3' AND PL_STAT IN ('3')) ) AND USE_YN = 'Y'

SELECT Z.* FROM ( SELECT
TLM.MASTER_SEQ ,TLM.MASTER_TO_ID ,TLM.COM_CODE ,FN_COM_CODE(TLM.COM_CODE) AS COM_CODE_NM ,TLM.MEMBER_SEQ ,FN_MEMBER_NAME(TLM.MEMBER_SEQ) AS MEMBER_NM ,TLM.SUB_YN ,TLM.PRE_REG_YN ,TLM.PRE_LC_NUM ,TLM.PL_CLASS ,FN_CD_DTL('CLS001',TLM.PL_CLASS) AS PL_CLASS_NM ,TLM.CORP_USER_YN ,TLM.CAREER_TYP ,FN_CD_DTL('CAR001',TLM.CAREER_TYP) AS CAREER_TYP_NM ,TLM.API_CAREER_YN ,TLM.PL_PRODUCT ,FN_CD_DTL('PRD001',TLM.PL_PRODUCT) AS PL_PRODUCT_NM ,TLM.PL_REG_STAT ,FN_CD_DTL('REG001',TLM.PL_REG_STAT) AS PL_REG_STAT_NM ,TLM.PL_STAT ,FN_CD_DTL('MAS001',TLM.PL_STAT) AS PL_STAT_NM ,TLM.PL_REGIST_NO ,TLM.CON_NUM ,TLM.CI ,CASE WHEN TLM.PL_CLASS = '1' THEN TLM.PL_M_NAME WHEN TLM.PL_CLASS = '2' THEN TLM.PL_CEO_NAME END AS PL_M_NAME
,TLM.PL_M_Z_ID ,TLM.PL_M_Z_ID_EDU ,FN_CELLPHONE(TLM.PL_CELLPHONE) AS PL_CELLPHONE ,TLM.ADDR ,TLM.ADDR_DETAIL ,TLM.REG_ADDR ,TLM.REG_ADDR_DETAIL ,TLM.ADDR_BASE ,TLM.OTHER_FIELD ,TLM.WITHIN_GOVR ,TLM.PL_EDU_NO ,TLM.CAREER_START_DATE ,TLM.CAREER_END_DATE ,TLM.ENTRUST_DATE ,TLM.COM_CONT_DATE ,TLM.PL_MERCHANT_NAME ,TLM.PL_CEO_NAME ,TLM.PL_MERCHANT_NO ,TLM.PL_BUSINESS_NO ,TLM.COMP_PHONE_NO ,TLM.CORP_FOUND_DATE ,TLM.CAPITAL ,TLM.VOTING_STOCK_CNT ,TLM.PL_PAY_STAT
,TO_DATE(TLM.COM_REG_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') AS COM_REG_DATE ,TO_DATE(TLM.FIRST_APP_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') AS FIRST_APP_DATE ,TLM.CRE_APP_DATE AS ORIGIN_CRE_APP_DATE ,TO_DATE(TLM.CRE_APP_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') AS CRE_APP_DATE ,TLM.CRE_LICENSE_DATE AS ORIGIN_CRE_LICENSE_DATE ,TO_DATE(TLM.CRE_LICENSE_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') AS CRE_LICENSE_DATE ,TLM.PAY_DATE AS ORIGIN_PAY_DATE ,TO_DATE(TLM.PAY_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') AS PAY_DATE ,TLM.SEND_MSG ,TLM.PL_HIST_CD ,TLM.COM_HAEJI_DATE ,TLM.CRE_HAEJI_DATE ,TLM.FILE_SEQ ,TO_CHAR(TLM.REG_TIMESTAMP,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REG_TIMESTAMP ,TLM.UPD_SEQ ,TO_CHAR(TLM.UPD_TIMESTAMP,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS UPD_TIMESTAMP ,(SELECT TLP.PAY_TYPE FROM TB_LC_PAY TLP WHERE TLP.MASTER_SEQ = TLM.MASTER_SEQ ORDER BY TLP.PAY_SEQ DESC LIMIT 1) AS PAY_TYPE ,(SELECT TLP.NAME FROM TB_LC_PAY TLP WHERE TLP.MASTER_SEQ = TLM.MASTER_SEQ ORDER BY TLP.PAY_SEQ DESC LIMIT 1) AS PAY_NAME ,(SELECT TLP.REG_TIMESTAMP FROM TB_LC_PAY TLP WHERE TLP.MASTER_SEQ = TLM.MASTER_SEQ ORDER BY TLP.PAY_SEQ DESC LIMIT 1) AS ORIGIN_PAY_REG_DATE ,(SELECT TO_CHAR(TLP.REG_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY-MM-DD') FROM TB_LC_PAY TLP WHERE TLP.MASTER_SEQ = TLM.MASTER_SEQ ORDER BY TLP.PAY_SEQ DESC LIMIT 1) AS PAY_REG_DATE ,TLM.pl_stat_req_seq ,TLM.pl_stat_req_path ,TLM.USER_SEQ FROM TB_LC_MAS01 TLM
AND TLM.USE_YN = 'Y' AND TLM.PL_STAT IN ('3','4','6','7','9') -- 변경요청, 해지요청, 변경요청(보완), 해지요청(보완), 완료
AND TLM.COM_CODE IN ('3000001',(SELECT COM_CODE FROM TB_LC_MEMBERS WHERE MEMBER_SEQ = #{regSeq})) -- 시스템이랑 로그인한 사용자와 동일한 회원사 코드인 정보만 출력
AND FN_MEMBER_NAME(TLM.MEMBER_SEQ) LIKE '%' || #{memberNm} || '%'
AND TLM.PL_CLASS = #{plClass} AND TLM.CORP_USER_YN = 'N'
AND TLM.PL_CLASS = '1' AND TLM.CORP_USER_YN = 'Y'
AND TLM.PL_PRODUCT = #{plProduct}
AND (CASE WHEN TLM.PL_CLASS = '1' THEN TLM.PL_M_NAME WHEN TLM.PL_CLASS = '2' THEN TLM.PL_CEO_NAME END ) LIKE '%' || #{plMName} || '%'
AND TLM.PL_M_Z_ID = #{plMZId}
AND FN_CELLPHONE(TLM.PL_CELLPHONE) LIKE '%' || #{plCellphone} || '%'
AND TLM.PL_MERCHANT_NAME LIKE '%' || #{plMerchantName} || '%'
AND TLM.PL_MERCHANT_NO = #{plMerchantNo}
AND TLM.PL_REG_STAT = #{plRegStat}
AND TLM.PL_STAT = #{plStat}
AND TLM.MASTER_TO_ID LIKE '%' || #{masterToId} || '%'
AND TLM.REG_TIMESTAMP >= #{srchDate1}::TIMESTAMP
AND TLM.REG_TIMESTAMP < #{srchDate2}::TIMESTAMP + INTERVAL '1 day'
ORDER BY TLM.MASTER_SEQ ASC )Z
